name: Gorshenin Institute EU, AISBL
goal: As non-profit international association the Gorshenin Institute promotes and encourages democratic principles, intercultural understanding, scientific and commercial relations and partnership between the EU, EU Member States, on the one hand, and the EU neighbouring and other countries, on the other hand, their national and international institutions, organisations and corporations.
interests: Communication, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy
